name: Sewer
description:
Sewer is a game made by a single Polish developer, Łukasz Drzensla. It tells a story of Dean Foster who lives during a civil war. It combines adventure, puzzles and exploration into one game with lots of sneaking. Have fun! 

Release on 13.05.2018 at 22.00 GMT + 1

System requirements (Windows and Linux)

Minimal (Medium, 30fps, 720p)Recommended (High, 40+fps, 1080p)CPU: Intel Core 2 Duo E8500
RAM: 2GB
GPU: GeForce 9800GTCPU: Intel Core i3 4170
RAM: 4GB
GPU: GeForce GTX 750

Linux version was tested with Ubuntu Mate 17.04 but should work with other distros. Windows version works on 32bit and 64bit and with Windows XP and above. Linux version is 64bit only.

System requirements (Mac) 

Minimal (game runs)Recommended (playable)CPU: 3,06GHz Core 2 Duo
RAM: 4GB
GPU: Radeon HD 4670 256MBCPU: i5 5350U
RAM: 8GB
GPU: Intel HD 6000

Due to lack of access to Mac hardware any reports of game running on certain configurations are highly appreciated.

Game contains flashing lights and might not be appropriate for people with epilepsy or other illnesses. Content might be inapropriate for younger audiences (under 13) as it contains vulgar language and violence so parental advisory is recommended.
